cmd='sh;-c;/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/sdcv/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/sdcv-prefix/src/sdcv/configure --host="arm-linux-gnueabi" PKG_CONFIG_PATH="/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/glib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/glib-prefix/src/glib-build/lib/pkgconfig" CXX="arm-linux-gnueabi-g++ -static-libstdc++" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -ffast-math -pipe -fomit-frame-pointer  -march=armv7-a -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon -mthumb -mfloat-abi=softfp -fno-finite-math-only -fno-stack-protector -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fPIC -I/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/zlib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/zlib-prefix/src/zlib" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-O1 -Wl,--as-needed -static-libstdc++ -L/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/zlib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/zlib-prefix/src/zlib" LIBS=" 		-lpthread -lrt 		/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/zlib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/zlib-prefix/src/zlib/libz.a 		-static-libgcc -static-libstdc++"'
